Text: .3gp format? Da hell?! Oh well, it's a valid file, and I'm watching it now, so don't worry, it's not a scam.
if anyone has a problem, simply change the format type. in folder option>view then click hide extentions for known file types, then remove the 3pg and replace with avi.
